name: Lanky Sammelot
description:
Info:

THIS IS A JOKE GAME MADE FOR MY FRIEND AND TWITCH STREAMER/YOUTUBER  KINGSAMMELOT!!!

Play as Ethan, who has heard rumors about the house on Texas Lane, and about a man known as Lanky Sammelot. Venture through the house and discover the mysteries of Lanky Sammelot!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Shift - Run

E - Interact

Extra:

Thanks for playing my silly little game, this was my first game in Unity so I hope I did ok! It is a little short but I hope u enjoy it all the same!
